short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ainisa - AI Assistant, Translator, Content Generator, ChatBot always with you

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
✨ Meet Ainisa - your ultimate AI-powered companion! 🌟 Whether you need a chatbot, assistant, or content generator, Ainisa is here to serve you at every turn. This incredible AI assistant enables you to produce high-quality content, invoices, images, code, and so much more, all while saving you a significant amount of money! 💸

With Ainisa by your side, creating engaging social media posts, writing captivating blog articles, and organizing your daily chores becomes a breeze. Always at your service, Ainisa enhances your work efficiency and effectiveness. Not only does Ainisa help you engage better and save precious time, but it also keeps you in the loop with the latest trends! 🌍✨

Need translations? SEO keywords? YouTube titles? Code generation? Invoices? Ainisa does it all! Elevate your content and productivity with Ainisa lending a helping hand. 🙌

By embracing Ainisa, you can save a whopping 60% of your time! ⏱️✨

Ainisa is only AI Assistant which will speak to you like a human !

Ainisa stands out as the only AI Chat Assistant which has most of features of ChatGPT for both subscribed and non-subscribed users. Want to conduct a web search? No problem! Need an image generated? It’s done! May be PowerPoint presentations ? Of course ! Just give it a try! 🌈

Plus, Ainisa features a unique voice recording option. Prefer talking over typing? Simply record your voice! 🎤

Create stunning AI images with various customizable settings, and generate documents, invoices in formats like PDF, TXT, and Word with ease. 📄✨

And this is not all 🤩 . You can create Powerpoint presentations with Ainisa. Just tell her to generate presentation with custom colors, tables and charts 📊. 

Ainisa also includes a web search feature powered by popular search engines. Looking for weather updates? Just ask Ainisa! 🌦️❓

May be you have data and want to visualize it with graphs and charts ? No problem, Ainisa will do it for you 📊

Or you want to create audio speech from your text ? Ainisa can also do it for you. Send your text to Ainisa and see the magic happen ! 🎶

Experience lightning-fast content creation—up to 10 times faster—with Ainisa leading the way! ⚡ And guess what? You receive free usage every day! 🎉

With low costs designed for accessibility, this powerful Chrome extension is perfect for everyone, especially entrepreneurs, businesses, and teams! 🤝

Enjoy fully functional file uploads for both subscribed and non-subscribed users, using drag and drop, file selection, or copy and pasting. Just take a screenshot, drag it into Ainisa Chat, and watch how it effortlessly manages everything else for you! 🖼️✨

You can send messages, files, and generate code and images—all in a single platform! Chat seamlessly with various document formats with single prompt. 📊✨

Access the latest in AI technology with ChatGPT 4 and Claude AI models available for your needs ! 🧠💬

Discover a universe of possibilities with Ainisa—your all-in-one AI assistant! 🌟💖

Change Logs:

== Version 2.3.5 ==
Now Ainisa can fully show math formulas
Now Ainisa can read pptx files
Several bugs were fixed

== Version 2.3.5 ==
Several fixes for document generation were done
Little changes in UI was done
Text to audio feature was added - Check it and share you thoughts

== Version 2.3.0 ==
Several fixes with AI tools were made
New feature - data visualization with graph charts

== Version 2.2.2 ==
Now Advanced mode is enabled by default. AI will know what you want
Now Web search is separate button
Now you will be able to see web search result sources
Now weather information will be shown with details
Now Ainisa will act like a human

== Version 2.1.0 ==
Download buttons were added for generated files
Now it is possible to generate powerpoint presentations.
Presentations with custom slide color, title and text color, lists, tables and charts (bar chart, pie chart, line chart, doughnut chart) are available

== Version 2.0.0 ==
Several bugs were fixed
Informational buttons for AI models were added 
We increased daily free tokens to 20000 ! 
Now it is possible to generate documents. PDF, TXT or DOCX. Just tell Ainisa which you need !
We added voice recording feature for those who don't want to type. (Beta)
New features were added to context menu - Summarize, Check grammar, Paraphrase, Explain Shortly.

== Version 1.3.7 ==
Problem with scroll down was fixed
Problems with UI were fixed
Claude 3.5 Sonnet was added to list of AI models
Advanced mode now has new feature - Weather information. You can ask about weather in your city to Ainisa
Tokens for all subscription packages were increased. Now you can get more from Ainisa

== Version 1.3.5 ==
Scroll down button added
Fully working google login added
Problems in UI were fixed
GPT-4o-mini was added to AI models list
Now users with no subscription can upload files

== Version 1.3.0 ==
Many bugs were fixed
Answers of AI were improved
Google Login was added. Now you can login with one click
Now we have fully functional file upload: by choosing file, by copy pasting file or by drag & drop

== Version 1.2.0 ==
In this version several bugs were fixed.
Chrome Extension updated to version 1.2
Web access mode disabled
Advanced mode was added. Now you can enable advanced mode and do web search, image generation etc.
Drag and drop file upload was added

== Version 1.1.0 ==
Several backend and API bugs were fixed

== Version 1.0.0 ==
Most usefull features such as:
AI templates
AI image generator
AI Chat with most of features of ChatGpt
Chat with documents and images, tools
